EmailTemplate.description: Template used for sending manager feedback notification
EmailTemplate.name: Manager Feedback CommentNotification
EmailTemplate.subject: Manager Feedback Comment Notification:{!Manager_Feedback_Comment__c.Managers_Feedback__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A comment '{!Manager_Feedback_Comment__c.Comments__c}' has been added to your feedback {!Manager_Feedback_Comment__c.Managers_Feedback__c}.
Thank you, Sutter Health
